title: How will industry 4.0 transform manufacturing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Industry 4.0 refers to the recent trend towards automation and data exchange in manufacturing. The transfer of information between humans and machines has enabled manufacturers to enhance and automate their systems, become more efficient, and produce less waste. Right now, it’s critical for manufacturers to keep up with these changes in the industry, as they are bound to have a large effect on the future of production around the world. One area that is immediately apparent is the technical assistance provided by cyber physical systems. These systems can do the tasks that are too exhausting and dangerous for humans to complete and even use data collected to make spur of the moment decisions in certain urgent situations without the needing the help of humans. My post here outlines more ways that Industry 4.0 will change the manufacturing industry: https://blog.temboo.com/what-is-industry-4-0/

🚚 Transform the supply chain to achieve advanced results; 🏭 Meaningful enhancement in the overall quality of on-demand manufacturing products & services; 💰Establishing new business models like Manufacturing-as-a-Service Here are only some of the major changes that industry 4.0 has already added to foster the manufacturing sector.
